body.p: Paris, Kentucky, attorney. Caroline County, Virginia, native. Son of Anthony Thornton. Moved to Bourbon County, Kentucky, in 1808. Began practicing law in Paris in 1810. Member of the House of Representatives of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from Bourbon County in 1812. Member of the Senate of the Commonwealth of Kentucky from 1829 to 1837.
